channel.title: Design on J.W. Boelens
channel.description: Recent content in Design on J.W. Boelens

item.title: Hi!
item.description: ðŸ‘‹ Hi! Welcome at my new website: jwb.co The last couple of months (years…?) I’ve dabbled with building a personal website. Do I need a website? Nope. But I like to build and design stuff. For my job this is what I do a lot, but having something personal on the web is new for me. I don’t have any social media accounts (I hate Facebook and Twitter), so having a place to put something online is nice.
